channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Water valve access point, 6th August
item.description:
The area around this has been re tarmaced but the flap now doesnâ€™t lay flat as the tarmac has encroached in to the edge of the hole too much. It causes quite a bad trip hazard

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 71 Christ Church Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned roadworks sign & sandbags, 5th August
item.description:
Outside no. 8 Glencairn Park Road is a large roadworks warning sign. Been there for weeks, with no roadworks in the road. ALSO 2 sandbags at base of tree on opposite pavement - been there for months. All needs clearing away.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 6 Glencairn Park Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Mattress, road sign, freezer, bin been dumped, 5th August
item.description:
The pile of dumped stuff seems to have been growing over the last few months, now completely blocking pavement

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 2 Stearman Road, Hucclecote
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Poor road surface by entrance to recycling centre, 4th August
item.description:
The road surface is very poor where the main road joins the entrance to the recycling centre. A cyclist was serious hurt recently due to this.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Cleeve Station House Stoke Road, Stoke Orchard
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bollard in road is flashing, should be a steady light, 4th August
item.description:
On the A40 Golden Valley approach to Elmbridge Court roundabout, a bollard numbered 6539 is flashing. I t should be lit permanently and the flashing is distracting at night time.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A40, Longlevens
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown bush on pavement, 3rd August
item.description:
Overgrown bush on pavement obscuring view and making it impossible to see oncoming traffic when turning out of Guinevere Road

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 41 Tennyson Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Burnt Flytipped Matewrial at Location, 3rd August
item.description:
The location is the entrance to the Old Quarry off Cleeve Common Road. This entrance now seems to be being used as a burn site - EVEN in this dry weather! The residual burnt material is by the entrance to the footpath. Please can it be cleared up.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): The Dingle, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Recently planted tree has been snapped., 2nd August
item.description:
As above, this young tree has been snapped.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 65 Springbank Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree care and footpath maintenance, 1st August
item.description:
You will see from the photos that the path desperately needs attention. The trees are overhanging the path and you can even see where some smaller branches have fallen on the path. This is a long standing problem.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 29 Golden Vale, Churchdown
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes - one quite deep, 1st August
item.description:
The location is the Cleeve Common Road just past the entrance to upper hill farm and into the trees. The potholes has gotten worseand is in the wheel track of this narrow road. Part of the road just past the pothole has also eroded. Please can these be filled in.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Cleeve Common, Whittington
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Several deep sharp edged potholes at location, 1st August
item.description:
The location is the Cleeve Common Road going towards the common on a bend where there is a gate going into the woods on the left hand side. The potholes are right in the wheel track so it is difficult to avoid them and definitely could cause damage to tyres. The side of the road is also eroded on the right hand side and as this is a bit of a pinch point for two vehicles trying to pass each other can this be repaired as well. Please can this area be filled in.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown trees and bushes partially blocking shared cycle/footpath, 31st July
item.description:
The vegetation has grown to the extent that there is barely room to cycle along the path, and no room to pass oncoming cycles or pedestrians. This is likely to cause an accident due to the lack of proper upkeep of the right of way.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A40, Barnwood
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead tree, 31st July
item.description:
As above. Dead tree

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 11 Pilgrove Close, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 big potholes and a small one, 31st July
item.description:
Getting bigger as traffic driving over the area

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 6 Shaw Green Lane, Prestbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Very bad condition of road surface, 31st July
item.description:
Road surface on the northwest side of Gloucester Road (B4633) is in very bad condition, with many small potholes, depressions and ruts, making it dangerous for cycling.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 2 Brickfield Drive, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Vehicles parking on pavement & blocking road, 30th July
item.description:
Football supporters visiting the Whaddon ground do not use the park and ride, the close fills up with cars and when full the vehicles park on the pavements which leaves the road blocked to emergency vehicles and even cars have a problem passing down the street.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Saint Anne's Close, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Possible water leak, 30th July
item.description:
This corner is permanently wet, even through the recent hot spell, leaving a long roughly two foot puddle on the bend. It seems to be flowing away down the hill without crossing the road but I suspect that there is a leaky pipe somewhere nearby which Severn Trent Water might be interested in.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 2 The View The View, Cleeve Hill
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipped frodges, 30th July
item.description:
2

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): St. Georges Flats, 22 Swindon Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cans and the nitrous oxide canisters a big one behind the bus stop on Tennyson Road opposite Byron Road, 29th July
item.description:
Cans and the nitrous oxide canisters a big one behind the bus stop on Tennyson Road opposite Byron Road. Can someone clean it up please

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 7 Tennyson Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown foot paths, 29th July
item.description:
Hasn't been cut since last year, too overgrown to pass
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Silver Birches A4019, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
